      • defaultDescriber

        public static Describer<java.lang.Object> defaultDescriber()

        Get a default describer. This describer uses the following algorithm:

        1. If the object is Describable, call its its Describable.describeTo(DescriptionWriter) method.
        2. If the object is Serializable, write its class and a SHA1 checksum of its serialized form to the description.
        3. Otherwise, generate a random UUID as the object’s description. This UUID is remembered, so the same object will have the same UUID within a single instance of the JVM.

        Returns:
        A describer implementing the logic above.
